description: An island inhabited by a tribe of natives and giant birds. Known for its advanced medicinal knowledge and the unique relationship between humans and birds.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Departs Torino Kingdom
keyEvents.description: Chopper says goodbye to the villagers and giant birds as he leaves the island to reunite with Luffy.

statusHistory.description: Chopper arrives and lives among the natives and birds

description: A massive bridge construction project in the East Blue that has been under construction for 700 years. Criminals and slaves are forced to work on the bridge.

keyEvents.title: Robin Departs Tequila Wolf
keyEvents.description: Robin leaves Tequila Wolf with the Revolutionary Army after being rescued from slavery.

statusHistory.description: Robin was sent here by Bartholomew Kuma and enslaved
Revolutionary Army freed the slaves including Robin

description: An island kingdom on Momoiro Island where 'those with a heart of a maiden' gather. The kingdom is ruled by Emporio Ivankov and is inhabited by okama. It serves as a base for the Revolutionary Army's G Army.

keyEvents.title: Caroline Refuses Sanji's Request
keyEvents.description: Sanji tries to convince Caroline to give him a boat to leave the island.

keyEvents.title: Ivankov Returns to Kingdom
keyEvents.description: Emporio Ivankov returns to Kamabakka Kingdom after the Paramount War.

keyEvents.title: Sanji vs Ivankov Battle
keyEvents.description: Sanji battles Ivankov to prove he is a member of Luffy's crew.

statusHistory.description: Sanji was sent here by Bartholomew Kuma

description: The Revolutionary Army's headquarters, an island kept secret from the World Government. It serves as the base of operations for Monkey D. Dragon and the Revolutionary Army's leadership.

keyEvents.title: Dragon Calls from Baltigo
keyEvents.description: Dragon contacts Ivankov from Baltigo to discuss Luffy's actions and the Revolutionary Army's response.

keyEvents.title: Dragon Decides to Gather Commanders
keyEvents.description: Dragon announces his decision to gather all Revolutionary Army commanders at Baltigo due to Whitebeard's death.

statusHistory.description: First appearance as Revolutionary Army headquarters

significantFeatures: Secret location unknown to World Government

description: Massive gates that connect the three most important Marine facilities: Marineford, Enies Lobby, and Impel Down. They create a special current system that allows safe passage between these locations.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Group Passes Through Gates
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Rayleigh, and Jinbe force Marines to open the Gates of Justice so they can return to Marineford.

significantFeatures: Connects Marineford, Enies Lobby, and Impel Down
